titles.title: I Want To See Israel Marching

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to see Israel marching
I want to hear the Kingdom call
I want to climb Zion's mountain
I want to see great Babylon fall
I want to see Jesus reigning
Upon King David's royal throne
Oh won't that be a glorious sight to see
When Israel comes marching home.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yo quiero ver a Israel marchando
Yo quiero oír el llamado del reino
Quiero subir al monte Sión
Yo quiero ver caer a Babilonia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yo quiero ver a Jesús reinando
Sobre este trono real de David
Que vista tan maravillosa será
Cuando Israel vuelva a su hogar
